question: Ah ia̍h-sī bô siau-tû chiu-biat chi̍t kóa ê bu̍t-phín tiong, teh 2012 chì 2013 ê kî-kan, ū siáⁿ chi̍t kóa ê bu̍t-phín ê kè-siàu siāng tōa ê kiàn-chiáⁿ?
answer: home equity and residential real estate loans 2013 purchased impaired loans ( b )

question: Tī 2013 nî (bô kā tiâu-chéng ê pō͘-hūn chiap--khì), kā kok-khuán hō-kū tōa-ê chiām-chiām hō-lū--khì, ē tit-tio̍h sió-sió-á ê chóng-kè sī sì-chái? (tan-ūi: pah-bān)
2013 niâ ê uî-gîn tûng-chha thut siōng-tōa phiah-tōa ê hō͘-iân sī hō-sò͘, chiàⁿ-bī sī siáⁿ-choá?
Tiongsui si chiah "sio̍k-tē kah chū-tō͘ chha̍t-chok sán-gia̍p hō͘-chiong ( a )" chong-thé ê chōng-thài, tùi 2012 nî nî-boán kàu 2013 nî nî-boán ū siám-miâ ê piàn-tōng?
answer: Chong-thé ê sio̍k-tē kah chū-tō͘ chha̍t-chok sán-gia̍p hō͘-chiong ê chong-koan-gia̍h, tùi 2012 nî nî-boán ê $51,160 pah-bān, cheng-ka kàu 2013 nî nî-boán ê $51,512 pah-bān. Che tùi chong-thé phó͘-lìn lâi-kóng, sī chi̍t ê kīn 0.69% ê chió-liōng cheng-ti Truong.

question: Siong-liat chū 2012 nî ê lô-bōe lūi-hêng, in hân-chhù chhiau-kòe 6,000 pah-bān, koh tī 2013 nî ê hân-chhù kiám-chió ê ūi-tì chiah ūi chòe?
answer: home equity and residential real estate loans 2013 purchased impaired loans ( b )

question: Na ke nî, 'tsóng-kè hūnn-kè kap tsū-ke̍k tē sán-iâⁿ-ka̍h ê tōa-chiam ( a )' tang-tiong, 'bâi-tiāu ê tōa-chiam' chiàm to-siâu píng-tō͘?

Nāi-koán 'home equity and residential real estate loans 2013 purchased impaired loans ( b )' ê kái-chíh ūi-tī 2012 nî ê tōa-sè, chiūnn-kóng bô pa̍t-ê piàn-hòa, 2013 nî ê sin 'total home equity and residential real estate loans ( a )' ē sī siáⁿ-mih?
Àn-chú su-kì, tō-chāi 2012 chì 2013 nî kan, piau-chún-sè ê chū-tōaⁿ sán-gia̍p tìn-chì ê tâng-tn̂g (bô pau-koat sún-hāi ê) kah sún-hāi ê kap chèng-hú pó-chèng ê tìn-chì ê kî-kan, ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē?
answer: Ū chi̍t ê tōa-ê koan-hē. Piau-chún ê 'chū-tōaⁿ sán-gia̍p tìn-chì' pò͘-tē-tâi cheng-tióng 1,651 pah-bān, tān-sī 'lâi chòe sún-hāi ê tìn-chì' kap 'chèng-hú pó-chèng' nn̄g ê lūi-hêng lóng kiám-sú (hun-pia̍t kiám-sú 1,090 pah-bān kap 575 pah-bān). Che chí-sī chi̍t ê chiàn-lio̍k-sèng ê tōaⁿ-khì, hō͘ chòe-khò͘ pò͘-tē-tâi tâng-tn̂g, chiám-sú sún-hāi kah chèng-hú tāi-chhiat ê chu-sán.

question: Chit ê loan phiah-bo̍k ê liân-liân kái-piàn, chiah-ê tú hō͘ siâng-ê sîng-pun ū siáⁿ-chē nn̄g-ê sió-thâu ê éng-hióng tī choân-thâu loan-ê kò͘-chiong?
answer: home equity and residential real estate loans 2013 excluding purchased impaired loans ( a )

question: Tī chit ê pi-áⁿ lāi-bīn, ū kúi-ê tâng-sû ū chham-khó 'siu koh-chài phái-hó ê siau-chè' (purchased impaired loans) tī i ê biâu-siā lāi?
Tsit-tang kuan-î tsuân-thé ka-choân-tîng kah tsū-tshī tē-tshig tsu-kîng, tēnn-tsuánn pí 2012 nî tō 2013 nî tō sím-tsúnn tsing-ka?
